name: Ninja Tap Superhero Game PRO - Great City Adventure Flyer Game
name_original: Ninja Tap Superhero Game PRO - Great City Adventure Flyer Game
description:
Ninja Tap Superhero Game PRO - Great City Adventure Flyer Game is an arcade game developed by Slap It Apps. It was originally released in 2014. Slap It Apps published the game.
You can play Ninja Tap Superhero Game PRO - Great City Adventure Flyer Game on iOS.
